level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice interior design.
Chapter 33 of this Title shall supplement this chapter.
The provisions of this chapter shall prevail in the event of a direct and irreconcilable conflict between this chapter and Chapter 33 of this Title.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง5(3) of the District of Columbia Interior Designer Licensure Act of 1986, D.C. Law 6-172, D.C. Code ยง2-3404(3) (1988), and Mayor’s Order 87-277, 35 DCR 47 (January 1, 1988).
